page.title: 09School Uniform
page.content: We thought it would be a good idea to take a look at the question of school uniform. Perhaps in the future boys and girls will want to know what we thought about it in 1985. The main colour of our uniform is grey and green. The boys have grey trousers and jumpers, the girls grey skirts and green or grey jumpers. Both the girls and the boys wear ties, ours are green with a black and orange stripe across them. The reasons why the children thought "{school uniform}" was unpopular are as follows: 1.{Unfeminine} 7.{No freedom of 2.{Uncomfortable. choice. 3.{Expensive. 4.{Unsuitable. 5.{Unfashionable. 6.{Colourless.
